Title.title: Title
Title.description: Text shown in the top left corner when the app opens.

Logo.title: Light Mode Logo
Logo.description: Path to the logo shown in the top right corner when the app opens. Scales to 48 points maximum height.

LogoDarkMode.title: Dark Mode Logo
LogoDarkMode.description: Path to the logo shown in the top right corner when the app opens for Dark Mode. Scales to 48 points maximum height.

NotificationIcon.title: Notification Icon
NotificationIcon.description: Path to a custom square image to be shown in alerts and the about window.

StatusBarIcon.title: Status Bar Icon
StatusBarIcon.description: Path to the status bar icon shown in the menu bar. Recommended: PNG, 16x16 points

StatusBarIconSFSymbol.title: Status Bar SF Symbol Icon
StatusBarIconSFSymbol.description: Custom status bar icon using an SF Symbol. Ignored when StatusBarIcon is also set.

StatusBarIconNotifierEnabled.title: Enable Status Bar Software Update Notifier
StatusBarIconNotifierEnabled.description: Shows a small notification badge in the Status Bar icon when there is an Apple Software Update available.

CustomColor.title: macOS Accent Color
CustomColor.description: Custom color in HEX for all symbols. Leave empty to use macOS Accent Color.

CustomColorDarkMode.title: macOS Dark Mode Accent Color
CustomColorDarkMode.description: Custom color in HEX for all symbols in Dark Mode. Leave empty to use macOS Accent Color or CustomColor if specified.

HideFirstRow.title: Hide First Row
HideFirstRow.description: Hides the first row of configurable items.

HideSecondRow.title: Hide Second Row
HideSecondRow.description: Hides the second row of configurable items.

ErrorMessage.title: Error Message
ErrorMessage.description: Shown when clicking an action that results in an error.

ShowWelcomeScreen.title: Show Welcome Screen
ShowWelcomeScreen.description: Shows the welcome screen when the Support App is opened for the first time.

FooterText.title: Footer Text
FooterText.description: Text shown at the bottom as footnote

OpenAtLogin.title: Open At Login
OpenAtLogin.description: Launch Support automatically at login and keep it open (macOS 13 and higher). This setting is ignored if a legacy LaunchAgent is installed/active. Disable this if you don't want to open Support at login or use your own LaunchAgent

InfoItemOne.title: Info Item 1
InfoItemOne.description: Info item shown in the upper left corner.

InfoItemTwo.title: Info Item 2
InfoItemTwo.description: Info item shown in the upper right corner.

InfoItemThree.title: Info Item 3
InfoItemThree.description: Info item shown in the second row left.

InfoItemFour.title: Info Item 4
InfoItemFour.description: Info item shown in the second row right.

InfoItemFive.title: Info Item 5
InfoItemFive.description: Info item shown in the third row left.

InfoItemSix.title: Info Item 6
InfoItemSix.description: Info item shown in the third row right.

UptimeDaysLimit.title: Computer Uptime Limit
UptimeDaysLimit.description: Days of uptime after which a notification badge is shown, disabled by default

PasswordExpiryLimit.title: Password Expiration Limit
PasswordExpiryLimit.description: Days until password expiry after which a notification badge is shown, disabled by default

PasswordLabel.title: Password Label
PasswordLabel.description: Alternative text label shown in the Password info item.

StorageLimit.title: Storage Limit
StorageLimit.description: Percentage of storage used after which a notification badge is shown, disabled by default.

FirstRowTitleLeft.title: First Row Left Title
FirstRowTitleLeft.description: The text shown in the button label.

FirstRowSubtitleLeft.title: First Row Left Subtitle
FirstRowSubtitleLeft.description: Subtitle text will appear under title when the user hovers over the button. Ignored if left empty.

FirstRowTypeLeft.title: First Row Left Link Type
FirstRowTypeLeft.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization.

enum_titles: Command or Script (Run with elevated privileges)

FirstRowLinkLeft.title: First Row Left Link
FirstRowLinkLeft.description: The Bundle Identifier of the App or URL that should be opened, command or script to be run.

FirstRowSymbolLeft.title: First Row Left Symbol
FirstRowSymbolLeft.description: The SF Symbol shown in the button.

ExtensionTitleA.title: Support App Extension A: Title
ExtensionTitleA.description: The title shown in extension A.

ExtensionSymbolA.title: Support App Extension A: Symbol
ExtensionSymbolA.description: The SF Symbol shown in extension A.

ExtensionTypeA.title: Support App Extension A: Type
ExtensionTypeA.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization.

enum_titles: Command or Script (Run with elevated privileges)

ExtensionLinkA.title: Support App Extension A: Link
ExtensionLinkA.description: The Bundle Identifier of the App, URL or command to open.

HideMajorUpdates.title: Hide Major macOS Updates / Upgrades
HideMajorUpdates.description: Ignore macOS major updates. This will prevent the menu bar icon and the macOS version info item from showing an available major update.
